sentences.sContent: We were each handed a badge with our name on it.
sentences.sCn: 我们每个人都拿到一个徽章，上面有我们的名字。

remMethod.val: 身缠绷带(bandage)， 胸前佩章(badge)

trans.tranOther: a small piece of metal, cloth, or plastic with a picture or words on it, worn to show rank, membership of a group, support for a political idea etc
